title: Deaton Explains Decision Not to File Amicus Brief Supporting Coinbase
description:
In a recent tweet, prominent pro-XRP lawyer John Deaton addressed his decision not to file an amicus brief supporting Coinbase’s motion. Deaton clarified his stance, stressing that the Coinbase motion centers around a narrow aspect of the law, primarily concerned with establishing the lack of SEC jurisdiction over digital assets.
